import { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar.js' import {Button , Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import '../node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; import Dog from './dog.png' const Team = () => { const [team, setTeam] = useState([ { name: 'Omkaar', position: 'Chief Exec Officer' }, { name: 'Andrew', position: 'Team Member' } ]) return (

The Memory Glass Team

{team.map((team) => (

{team.name}

{team.position}

{team.name}

{team.position}
))}
); } export default Team;
